scripts.pkg:prep: jo branch=$(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD) commit=$(git rev-parse --short HEAD) rollbar=$(echo $ROLLBAR_SECRET) > config.json
scripts.pkg:build: pkg -t node7-linux --out-dir release package.json && cd release && mv sift-cli sift-cli-linux
scripts.pkg:sign: cd release && gpg --armor --clearsign --digest-algo SHA256 -u 22598A94 sift-cli-linux.sha256 && rm sift-cli-linux.sha256
scripts.pkg: npm run pkg:prep && npm run pkg:build && npm run pkg:hash && npm run pkg:sign
